messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Site news
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you Sandra. I do miss this bustling place. I did subscribe to your other blog, though. :) Julie On Sat, Dec 8, 2018 at 7:19 PM Sandra Dodd
messages.messageBody:
Thank you Sandra. I do miss this bustling place. I did subscribe to your other blog, though. :)

Julie

On Sat, Dec 8, 2018 at 7:19 PM Sandra Dodd Sandra@... [AlwaysLearning] <AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com> wrote:
 

Yahoogroups…. not so lively. :-)

The last thing I posted was a site-announcement link and here is another one. This one came from a quote I used in Just Add Light. I linked to the cake page. Caren Knox (dharmamama, maybe, in this group and some such places) sent another link to go with it, and I made a page of it. While looking for a place to upload photos for that, I found another page I had forgotten I had!!!

So.

Cake. The theme is cake. But not just cake itself. Lots of ideas, connections—to Spartacus, to the Peace Corps, to a vineyard in Colorado, to Africa, to medieval books, to everybody’s birthday, to Korea and…. well, you know how it goes. There’s some new stuff:

https://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2018/12/cake-or-death.html

Sandra

So.

Cake. The theme is cake. But not just cake itself. Lots of ideas, connections—to Spartacus, to the Peace Corps, to a vineyard in Colorado, to Africa, to medieval books, to everybody’s birthday, to Korea and…. well, you know how it goes. There’s some new stuff:

messages.subject: Site news
messages.msgSnippet: https://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2018/11/new-interview-and-related-things.html One thing you might’ve known, but probably not all three. :-) Consider
messages.messageBody:
https://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2018/11/new-interview-and-related-things.html

One thing you might’ve known, but probably not all three. :-)

Consider subscribing to that blog, and playing with the randomizer, so you can find more things you might have forgotten, or missed!

messages.subject: Site news
messages.msgSnippet: https://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2018/09/tool-reading-change.html When you’re at that blog, maybe subscribe. I don’t bring all the links here, but I
messages.messageBody:
https://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2018/09/tool-reading-change.html

When you’re at that blog, maybe subscribe. I don’t bring all the links here, but I am lately, for requests that this group be revitalized. :-)

Also maybe poke around the randomizer, because you might see either a page you havn’t seen, or one that will look different now, with your and better understandings.

Sandra

messages.subject: Site news
messages.msgSnippet: A couple of these aren’t so new, but hadn’t been announced.  Jo Isaac and her data on the ages unschoolers learn to read have been there a while, but for
messages.messageBody:
A couple of these aren’t so new, but hadn’t been announced. Jo Isaac and her data on the ages unschoolers learn to read have been there a while, but for those who didn’t know, have fun!

There is a beautiful photo there by Hannah North. And the page on Light and Lightness is linked from today’s Just Add Light and Stir (Thursday, January 4).

https://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2018/01/school-math-reading-ages-jo-isaac-light.html

Each link there leads to another three or more other pages. Full screens are better than phones for most of these.

Investing time in more solid knowledge of unschooling will help you in ways you probably can’t consider yet. :-)


Sandra

messages.subject: Site news
messages.msgSnippet: http://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2017/04/sharing-glued-or-not-awareness.html It will be prettier if you click the link above.   There’s a beatiful image
messages.messageBody:
http://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2017/04/sharing-glued-or-not-awareness.html

It will be prettier if you click the link above. There’s a beatiful image by Lydia Koltai there.

New writing by Karen Angstadt on the "Shared Experiences are Important" page, second item:
http://sandradodd.com/t/sharing

That item links to an addition on "Phrases to Hear and Avoid": Glued to the screen (Jo Isaac)
http://sandradodd.com/phrases#glued

Additions and links to "Your Mind and Awareness"
http://sandradodd.com/awareness

messages.subject: Site news
messages.msgSnippet: I have a blog that s just for announcements of changes to my unschooling pages.  Some of the newer readers might not know about it. I just put up a new post,
messages.messageBody:
I have a blog that's just for announcements of changes to my
unschooling pages. Some of the newer readers might not know about
it. I just put up a new post, but there might be several recent that
various of you could be interested in. There's also a yahoo list for
announcements for those who prefer e-mail. I send the same
announcements to both. It's linked on the main unschooling page.

Sandra


http://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/

UNSCHOOLING SITE NEWS, SANDRADODD.COM
NEW PAGES, ADDITIONS, CHANGES, EXCITEMENT AT SANDRADODD.COM/
UNSCHOOLING AND THEREABOUT
